events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request to return a recently purchased jacket has been identified as a refund case.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I'd be happy to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new and hasn't been worn or damaged. I just need to return it because of the size.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and once we receive it, we'll process a full refund to your original payment method.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today.
I've sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please let us know once you've shipped the jacket, and we will update you when the refund is processed.
Just following up to confirm if you were able to return the jacket and if you have received the refund amount yet.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and received the full refund yesterday. Appreciate your quick help!
Glad to hear your refund was successfully processed. We are closing this case, but please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on your recent support experience.
